name: Brick Invaderz
description:
A small game made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3

Enjoy this simple mash up of two classic games - Brick Breaker and Space Invaderz!

Use your paddle to hit enemies with your ball. This is a one button game, so use the spacebar to toggle between moving your paddle either left or right. Build up a streak by hitting multiple enemies with the ball. Try to get the highest score you can! 

~ Controls ~

Spacebar - Toggle between moving paddle left/right
